ResourceHeader.ResourceName: IMP 8 Cosmic Ray Nuclear Composition (CRNC) hourly energetic electron fluxes
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains hourly, spin-averaged
fluxes of electrons from the IMP8 Cosmic Ray Nuclear Composition
experiment of U. Chicago and UNH.  There are fluxes of electrons
in three energy bins: 0.7-2.0, 2-12, 12-50 MeV.  These fluxes
were generated at GSFC/SPDF from count rates accessible from
UNH.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Acknowledge the late John A. Simpson, the
original CRNC PI, and Clifford Lopate/UNH, current PI.

InformationURL.Name: Comprehensive data descriptive file
InformationURL.Description:
SFDU-formatted file describing the CRNC instrument
and the 15-min data set of count rates and pulse height data from which the
hourly rates data set was created.  Division of hourly rates by geometric
factor and energy band widths yielded the hourly fluxes.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description:
ftp access to electron-specific subdirectory
holding annual ASCII files

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: FTPBrowser
AccessURL.Description:
Subset, plot and list fluxes of protons, alpha
particles and electron, and count rates of heavies, via FTPBrowser

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement:
Acknowledge C. Lopate, J. Simpson, and GSFC/SPDF
(Space Physics Data Facility)

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Time at start of flux average, as year, day, hour

Parameter.Name: Fractional Coverage
Parameter.Description: Fractional counting coverage (0-1) during this hour

Parameter.Name: Electron fluxes
Parameter.Description:
Spin-integrated fluxes of electrons, at 1-hour resolution,
in three energy bins: 0.7-2.0, 2-12, 12-50 MeV

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes at 3 energy windows
